subject: Order #SSN5374 - I forgot to add the baseplate
description_text:
Hello Guys,

Happy new year!

I hope you are well.

I'm writing to check with you if you can assist me. Reviewing my order I
realised that by mistake, I forgot to add the baseplate.
I know that my order has been dispatched already, but I was wondering if
you could send me the base plate with the same price conditions as if I had
bought the whole set.

Thank you so much.

Kind Regards,
Rodrigo Lopes
rodrigoblopes@gmail.com
linkedin.com/in/rodrigoblopes

conversations.body_text: Hi Rodrigo Barros Lopes,     You can purchase the base plate separately using this link. Since it is shipped separately, the shipping cost calculation may differ, which can result in price differences when purchasing the base plate alone. Thank you for your understanding.Â   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-pedal-pro-x-with-heel-plate?variant=50475339645242
